name: FastFingeru
description:
Show everyone how good you are at typing! Get all the words that appear on the screen without losing any of them or fight against time in a 60 seconds time attack!

Currently supports two game mode, two different characters and a local leaderboard system.

If the game gets good feedback new updates will come soon like:

  • A global leaderboard system
  • New game mode with awesome upgrades and special abilityes
  • New characters
  • A lot of other fantastic things

Please leave any kind of feedback as you pass by :)
